title: My number was stolen

embed.description: He's one hell of a yordle. Praise Teemo.

body: My number was stolenï¼Œ he changed  my password and e-mail   .    that  link is  evidence

replies.body: I'm not sure I understand what's going on exactly, but it sounds like you might need a hand regaining access to your account.  Try our [account recovery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide which will provide a few steps to help with that.  You should also check out our[ account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide to protect your accounts in and outside of league against scams or phishing attempts.  Hope that helps!
